Day 1.heading: Dart 3 Basics & Modern Syntax
Day 1.details:
Day 1 me Dart 3 ke basics cover kiye.
Records sikhe jisse chhote data ke liye class banane ki zarurat nahi padti.
Sealed classes padhi jisse Loading, Success, Error jaise fixed states safely handle hote hain.
Pattern matching use ki jisse data easily extract ho jata hai.
Switch expression use kiya jisse if-else kam hua.
Focus tha modern Dart 3 style code likhna.

Records.details:
Records multiple values ko ek variable me store karne ka simple tareeqa hai.
Isme class banane ki zarurat nahi hoti.

Sealed Classes.details:
Sealed classes ka use fixed states banane ke liye hota hai.
Jaise loading, success ya error.

Day 2.heading: Async Programming & Event Loop
Day 2.details:
Day 2 me async programming cover ki.
Future aur async-await samjha.
Event loop ka basic flow dekha.
Heavy kaam isolate me shift karna sikha.

Future.details:
Future future me milne wale result ko represent karta hai.
Mostly API calls me use hota hai.

Isolate.details:
Isolate heavy kaam ko background me run karta hai.
UI freeze hone se bachata hai.

Day 3.heading: Generators & Extension Methods
Day 3.details:
Day 3 me generators aur extensions padhe.
sync*, async* aur yield samjha.
Custom stream banana sikha.
Extension methods se existing class improve ki.

sync* Generator.details:
sync* ek ek value generate karta hai.
Loop ke andar yield use hota hai.

Extension Method.details: Extension se existing class me apna function add kar sakte ho.

Day 4.heading: Flutter Widget, Element & Render Trees
Day 4.details:
Day 4 me Flutter ke 3 trees samjhe.
Widget tree UI ka structure hota hai.
Element tree widget aur render object ko connect karta hai.
RenderObject tree screen par drawing karta hai.

Widget Tree.details: Widget tree sirf UI ka blueprint hota hai.

RenderObject.details: RenderObject screen par actual painting karta hai.
RenderObject.example: Text widget ka RenderParagraph object text draw karta hai.

Day 5.heading: Keys & State Preservation
Day 5.details:
Day 5 me Keys cover ki.
Keys bina use kiye state loss ka issue dekha.
ValueKey use karke state fix ki.

Without Key.details: List reorder hone par state lost ho jata hai.

With ValueKey.details: ValueKey se Flutter ko pata chalta hai kaunsa widget kaunsa hai.

Day 6.heading: JSON Handling & ListView
Day 6.details:
Day 6 me JSON load aur ListView banayi.
Assets se JSON read ki.
FutureBuilder use karke data show kiya.

Load JSON.details: Assets se JSON file read karte hain.
Load JSON.example:
String data = await rootBundle.loadString('assets/data.json');
var jsonData = jsonDecode(data);

ListView.builder.details: Dynamic list banane ke liye use hota hai.

Day 7.heading: Navigation & Routing
Day 7.details:
Day 7 me navigation sikhi.
Ek screen se dusri screen pe jana.
Data pass karna sikha.

Navigation.details: Navigator.push se new screen open hoti hai.

Day 8.heading: Forms & Validation
Day 8.details:
Day 8 me forms aur validation cover ki.
User input lena aur check karna.

Form Validation.details: Empty input ko check kar sakte hain.

Day 9.heading: State Management Basics
Day 9.details:
Day 9 me state management basics.
setState ka use samjha.

setState.details: UI ko refresh karne ke liye use hota hai.

Day 10.heading: Basic Animations
Day 10.details:
Day 10 me animations ka intro.
Simple animation use ki.

AnimatedContainer.details: Property change hone par animation hoti hai.

Day 11.heading: Themes & Styling
Day 11.details:
Day 11 me theme aur colors.
App ka common design set kiya.

ThemeData.details: App ke colors aur fonts set karta hai.

Day 12.heading: Performance Optimization
Day 12.details:
Day 12 me performance tips.
Const widgets ka use sikha.

Const Widget.details: Const widgets unnecessary rebuilds se bachate hain.
